name: Classic Leather Jacket
description: Crafted from genuine leather, this classic jacket is the perfect mix of rugged and refined. Pair it with jeans or chinos for a sharp look. Durable, versatile, and never goes out of style.

name: Denim Jeans
description: High-quality denim jeans designed for both comfort and durability. Perfect for casual wear, these jeans offer a classic fit that suits a wide range of styles. Available in various shades.

name: Women's Summer Dress
description: Lightweight and breezy, this summer dress is perfect for warm days. Featuring a floral pattern and soft fabric, it provides comfort while keeping you stylish. A must-have for every womanâ€™s wardrobe.

name: Men's Polo Shirt
description: A versatile polo shirt that's ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Made from breathable cotton, this shirt offers maximum comfort without sacrificing style.

name: Women's Blazer
description: This tailored blazer elevates any outfit, whether you're dressing up for work or a night out. Made from high-quality materials, it offers a sleek, professional appearance with a modern touch.
